Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera, Great BUY!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Reavis "Mom Of Three"
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use for someone that is familiar with digital camera settings and for those who are not! If one downloads the complete manualthey will not have any problems using it.  The pictures that it takes are razor sharp and I had no blurred pictures.  Most of the complaintsof blurred pictures are mostly due to not pushing the shutter button halfway in order to set the focus first before finally taking thepicture.  The camera itself is quite small (shirt pocket size) and the finish of the body is very glossy.I love this camera!The included case, memory card and battery, and other accessories are so worth the purchase of this bundle compared to the camera only!

Reviews.Title: Great quality!
Reviews.Author: Mandy C. from Tennessee
Reviews.Content: I have had this on my wishlist for some time now and finally it came into the price range I could afford! I was very pleased when it arrived the very next day! (purchased thursday morning arrived friday afternoon at 4:00pm) It came with all listed parts and was very easy to set up and use. Other then the fact it takes a micro sd card which it did come with an adapter for. I love the fact that it has a wall charger so when I travel theres never the fear of running out of batterys. It also takes superb pictures and is very easy to use and customize. I'm glad that I finally made the purchase and also the fact that it came with 25 free prints helped also! :)

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Redeemed
Reviews.Content: The camera was shipped much quicker than I expected.  It's a great little camera--light weight and easy to hold and use.  I don't understand why Kodak has gotten out of the camera business???  I haven't had a chance to use it much yet, but so far I'm liking it.

Reviews.Title: kodak bundle
Reviews.Author: American Drilling Service
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kodak Camera purchase. I bought myself one a few years ago, which was recently stolen. I loved mine so much I bought one as a gift for my mother. I bought this one to replace mine that was stolen and I love it more than the first one that I had. The color is beautiful and the camera is small, lightweight and takes great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Kodak M853 Bundle
Reviews.Author: Tofu
Reviews.Content: Real happy with this camera, it takes very nice pictures. My previous camera is a kodak too but takes double AA batteries and it really eats those batteries up. This one has a lithium battery that last a whole lot longer and the camera is slimer too. The price is good, you pay just as much with just the camera itself without the case and SD card.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Valenzuela
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera the buttons are sometimes hard to press but overall good camera it doesn't hesitate to csture the moments you want.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kmen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad for fathers day and he absolutely loves it. He is not very advanced in technology and he has figured out to run it on his own. He says it takes good pictures. He is very happy with it. Would definitely recommend this bundle!!

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom for her Birthday. She is not technology savy, but easily picked up how to use. She does have a little trouble navigating through deleting pictures but other than that the camera is great. Shipped extremely fast, practically overnight. Great price for the camera + sim card + case!

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera.
Reviews.Author: ri
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera. Takes nice sharp pictures. Would be better if it used replaceable batteries. It has already survived a drop on the sidewalk with a few dings but continues to work fine.

Reviews.Title: camera is not the quailty i expected
Reviews.Author: james piano
Reviews.Content: it takes a lot of time in be tween shoots to take another picture,battery time is low,hard to share pics

Reviews.Title: Good Basic Camera
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera as a replacement for a previous Kodak Digital camera.  The camera takes OK pictures but is hard to operate if you have bigger than average fingers.  It is not a touch screen so it takes longer to operate and is cumbersome.  It is OK for everyday general use.

Reviews.Title: My daughter says she loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jose M. Dos Santos
Reviews.Content: Simple to use, fair enough pictures. She has lot the cable and transformer once... when will this issue be sorted out!

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: Kathy McAdoo
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything I was looking for, and it takes fantastic pictures as well as being easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Kodak M583 Digital Camera and case
Reviews.Author: Carolyn S. Morrow
Reviews.Content: My son loved this - it was a Christmas gift.  He had left his old camera on a train in France.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera.  The only thing I have against it is thatit takes just a little too long to snap the photo after you press the button.

Reviews.Title: Great price but.
Reviews.Author: Kylor2
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just a  simple point and shoot that would hopefully make family photos easy...It worked pretty good for a while then the flash stopped working. I was able to send it back to the manufacturer since it was under warranty. It was returned to me and worked pretty good for a bit, now there are some other focus issues...I don't think I would recommend this particular camera to anyone who just wants a worry free camera that takes good photos.

Reviews.Title: Just too complicated.
Reviews.Author: Hermit Lady
Reviews.Content: How do you find a simple camera anymore?  I searched and searched, read the reviews,and was still disappointed with this one. I thought buying a cheaper camera meant lessoptions... not so.(The original Sony DSC-P51 I bought in 2002 was much easier to understand, I was ableto use it right away. It's big and bulky in comparison, but I sure wish that onestill worked, the Sony was my dependable workhorse for online selling.)I guess if you want simple, it's a Kodak Brownie... they should have stuck with that idea andmade a digital option that's uncomplicated for everyday picture-taking, which is what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE
Reviews.Author: Donna Berg
Reviews.Content: this camera is terrible.  It advertises that you can upload directly to Kodak photos which is perfect for kids BUT Kodak photos was sold in July of 2012 and they don't tell you that.  Tried to retrun adn they not only refused but were VERY rude.  False advertsingdon't buy this camera, don't use this vendor

Reviews.Title: hate it
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: this camera takes nice picture but the problem is the record button is at the wrong stop. Also the timer speed is a pain. you cannot take multiple pic. Coming on also takes forever.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Latoya
Reviews.Content: For taking normal pictures. No issues so far. I've had it for a while and have used it quite a few times. Takes good pictures

Reviews.Title: would not recommend
Reviews.Author: Eloise
Reviews.Content: The camera locked up and wouldn't work just after the warenty ran out. Very disappointing. I only used it a couple of times

Reviews.Title: needed a new camera
Reviews.Author: T. Thies
Reviews.Content: this camera works great for me have no trouble working the screen and takes great pics.just love this camera

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: cop2125
Reviews.Content: i got this for my daughter for christmas it is a great starter digital camera for an 10 year old

Reviews.Title: Nice camera; fun to use
Reviews.Author: Diane Kaser
Reviews.Content: I have wanted a digital camera for a while.  This Kodak M583 Digital is my final decision.  Compact easy to use.  I am not a techie type person so I have to mess with it some more, but so far it's been easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy!
Reviews.Author: GODZILLA
Reviews.Content: ...I Regret That Kodak Is Going Out Of The Business...They Make Wonderful Cameras!  Please Koday Keep Going!  Great Deal For You!

Reviews.Author: muldersgirl "www.soulsearchers.info"
Reviews.Content: Still learning on this camera, but it takes GREAT pictures! And loading the pics onto your comp is a breeze

Reviews.Title: My Best Kodak
Reviews.Author: Harry Snider
Reviews.Content: Much better than my last Kodak which died after about 10 years. Love the video feature (my first), compact size and battery life (so far). Excelent value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my son's 9th birthday. He previously had a cheap off brand camera that he was getting too advanced for. The Kodak has taken terrific photos. Video is good as well. Enough features to keep you creative. Incredible value for the money. This is our 2nd Kodak - my wife has an older model and is wishing for one of these now. This will be a great point and shoot for anyone. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great!! Sorry to see them go!
Reviews.Author: shopperV
Reviews.Content: Good product from a great Icon Company!! The shipping was fast and the cameras are beautiful. Buttons are a bit small but nothing to complain about for the price.

Reviews.Title: Should have bought this first
Reviews.Author: California Lift-Op
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a replacement for the replacement. I should have bought this first instead of straying to a different brand.This is the second Kodak point and shoot. I took my first point and shoot everywhere from skiing the back country to riding on wave runners. After 4 seasons of snow skiing and carrying it in my leg pocket I think the moisture finally had it's way. I cracked the display screen two years ago but it still took great pictures until it would not turn on anymore.I thought I would go with the name of camera that has for years stood for quality and status. That was a mistake. I had charging problems with the camera within 30 days and when I returned it the company would not honor the warranty siting "Customer Misuse". Thankfully the extended warranty I purchased through Square Trade made the return without any problems and refunded my money.My previous Kodak was a trooper so why not take a chance. I bought this camera and I'm glad I did. Time will tell but I'm not worried. Pictures and video are excellent quality.

Reviews.Title: I am very pleased with my new camera.
Reviews.Author: SomeMore
Reviews.Content: I recieved my new Camera today and I can't put it down. The Kodak M583 is so light weight and just what I needed....

Reviews.Title: happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: ghscott
Reviews.Content: purchased this camera bundle for my grand daughter. SHE has not seen this one yet. she has my red one, don't know if she will get this one. It takes great pictures. Now one thing that bothered me about this purchase, was kodak is in trouble financially, and I don't know about a warrenty. But I guess I'll cross that bridge later. For now I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Farewell.Kodak, to some of your best products
Reviews.Author: Melvin Anderson "author Diabetes?What's That?"
Reviews.Content: Kodak made several good products and then quit making them for some reason, too often because the company thought these products did not tie in with their preconceived idea of what kind of a company they were, a film company, not a camera company and Bingo! They lost film cameras, cameras I thought highly competitive where they were selling. They did a good job on themselves with the advent of electronic digital cameras, they stuck with the chrome films and went bamkrupt, instead of being leaders in the field. And yet I liked their cameras, from look and shoot, up a little higher to computer control with point. pick controls, then click and shoot. They made good cameras im the lower end, I preferred them to Nikon,Canon, Fuji, Olympus, and other cameras at the beginning and on into the intermediate level, they had many good features. They had high optical values, high pixel count, several different modes for shooting with high values realized, and all at competitive pries. These features were all competitive or even better, as well. I do not have many Kodak cameras, only two, the Kodak Easy Share C913 and Easy Share M583. I got the C913 to lrarn how to use the digital camera, the other two cameras, Canon S3IS and Nikon D40X, were too complicated for me, I was a film user for 60 years and had to start from scratch, as bad as the Kodak company for thinking electronics could not catch up to optics. fool that I was. Well, the C913 should have taught me. What has happened since shows where electronics can go, and there is still room to grow.The M583 shows the C913 the way, just look at pixel count! I think there are only about two years between them but Kodak, for some reason, has backed out. It is still possible to find some Kodaks as surplus, try, the price is right for such high quality.

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak M583 Digital Camera, Value Bundle kit w/ Case, 4GB Card, Rechargeable Battery, Charger (Red)
